item.description:
Please note that even though this is the same Musquash Conservation Area in a hike that was scheduled on 12-10-11 it is using a different entrance to access some different trails on the opposite end of the Conservation Area. 

Here is a link to a trail map:

http://www.londonderrynh.org/Pages/LondonderryNH_CommDev/gisdocs/mus.pdf

 For this hike we will use the whole of the White Trail, Ravine Trail, and parts of the Blue Trail, Betty Mack Loop Trail, and the Overlook Trail for a 5 mile hike.  This hike compared to the one done here on 12-10-11 uses parts of the Betty Mack Loop trail we hiked on the 10th (1.6 miles) along with new trail sections that weren't done on the 10th (3.4 miles).
item.how_to_find_us: Just past 15 Faucher Road the road dead ends in a loop. The Trailhead starts right off the loop. Park on the loop or as close to it as you can.

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Musquash Conservation Area - 5 mile loop hike
